data.persona: I am a king of the whole empire. I give rules and pursuit them. I am brave and fearless.
data.description:
You are in the Treasure Room.
It is home to all the most valuable and legendary pieces of fortune that have been collected by the kingdom over hundreds of years. It contains many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold. Necklaces strewn about made from every type of valuable material imaginable. Legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers in all of the lands. Pieces of armor worn by the mightiest warriors that have ever lived are lined up meticulously on one of the walls.
There's some legendary swords, some legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers, some pieces of fortune, a magical crystal, many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold, a necklace, some pieces of armor, a priceless piece of art, and an ancient magical crystal that was found in the heart of a mystical dragon here.
The king himself and the keykeeper are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown and a cape.
data.goal: get gold from treasure chests filled to the brim with gold
